mainCarousel.alt: classic navy Navigation Down Jacket
Black Navigation Down Jacket

products.name: Navigation Down Jacket
products.whyWeMadeThis: Navigate the great outdoors in this insulated jacket. Powered by ThermoChannel™ construction to lock in heat, it's made from stretchy fabric to keep you warm and agile in the cold.

featurePanels.title: Water-Resistant, DiamondStretch™ Fabric(Click to Expand)
content: Our ThermoChannel™ construction creates channels of down insulation that hold feathers in place to lock-in warmth
100% of our down is certified to the Responsible Down Standard (RDS) by Control Union (No. 847515)

featurePanels.title: Classic Fit, Hip Length(Click to Expand)
content: Classic fit falls away from your body with room for layering
Wear it on its own or under your favourite shell

featurePanels.title: Material and care(Click to Expand)
content: Filling: 85% Grey goose down, 15% Grey Goose Feathers

products.name: The (Big) Mat Made With FSC-Certified Rubber
products.whyWeMadeThis: We designed this extra-long and wide version of The Mat for tall yogis and those who want to really stretch out during practice.

featurePanels.title: Materials(Click to Expand)
content: Our innovative grippy top layer absorbs moisture to help you stay grounded in high-sweat practices
A natural rubber base gives you cushioning and textured grip for low-sweat practices
CONTAINS LATEX: People with rubber or latex allergies should avoid contact with this product as it contains natural rubber and may contain latex
An antimicrobial additive helps prevent mould and mildew on the mat
I'm reversible—flip as needed between the smooth, grippy side and the cushioned, natural rubber side

featurePanels.title: Product Features(Click to Expand)
content: This mat will have a slight smell that will fade over time (we suggest you roll it out and air it out before heading to class)
Colour may change over time. After use, wipe mat down with a natural cleanser and store out of direct sunlight

featurePanels.title: Material and care(Click to Expand)
content: Body: 55% Natural rubber, 23% Synthetic rubber, 15% Polyurethane, 5% Polyester, 2% Nylon
Ensure the mat is dry before rolling
